channel.title: Ice barrage help please
channel.description:
Hello.
I was wondering if somebody could help me making ice barrage hit more than one person at once, But only hit the 2nd or 3rd person depending on there combat level.
I already know how to make it attack more than one player and how to make it only usable in multi combat.
Help would be apreciated thank you.
